page.title: 20Living in Bubbenhall
page.content: Population Bubbenhall village is a small and quiet place.Most non_local traffic is caused by customers to the 2 public houses.A majority of the inhabitants live in large modern detached houses,major new housing developments having taken place in the last 10/15 years.People buy goods from the only local shop,but most of the shopping is done in nearby towns_Leamington Spa,Warwick,Coventry_where most people tend to work.There is little work in Bubbenhall , other than the 2 public houses and farms.There is also a man who sells groceries from his van.Opposite "The Three Horseshoes" is a natural spring which is many hundreds of years old.It emits cool water even in the hottest,driest summers.Many local people believe it is better to drink than tap water.
